title: Film
description: JSON Schema for Film data structures

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the JSON file describing the film

id.description: unique identifier for the film data structure

owner.description: unique identifier of the film data structure owner

private.description: true if only the film data structure owner can have access to it, false otherwise

watchDate.description: the date when the film was watched by the owner

rating.description: the rating the owner has given to the film

favorite.description: true if the film is among the favourite ones of the owner, false otherwise
